[[Image:Ubuntu.png|right|200px|thumb|Screenshot of a Desktop wallpaper]]
The terms '''wallpaper''' and '''desktop picture''' refer to an image used as a background on a computer screen, usually for the [[desktop metaphor|desktop]] of a [[graphical user interface]]. 'Wallpaper' is the term used in [[Microsoft Windows]], while the [[Mac OS]] calls it a 'desktop background' (prior to [[Mac OS X]], the term '''desktop pattern''' was used to refer to a small pattern that was repeated to fill the screen).
The terms '''wallpaper''' and '''desktop picture''' refer to an image used as a background on a computer screen, usually for the [[desktop metaphor|desktop]] of a [[graphical user interface]]. 'Wallpaper' is the term used in [[Microsoft Windows]], while the [[Mac OS]] calls it a 'desktop background' (prior to [[Mac OS X]], the term '''desktop pattern''' was used to refer to a small pattern that was repeated to fill the screen).
